capability.name: Correspondent Bank Directory
capability.definition: This service domain maintains correspondent bank reference details. This includes correspondent bank payment parameters in particular bank limits and capturing transaction activity to track reciprocity
capability.role: This service domain maintains reference details specific to a correspondent banking partner covering payment terms and preferences and security keys. It also consolidates transactional activity as might be needed to track reciprocity with the correspondent bank. Any specific arrangements and terms (e.g. SSIs) that might override market directory details are maintained here as part of the data record.
capability.example: Correspondent bank (reciprocal) activity is consolidated to support periodic correspondent banking relationship reviews

key_features.name: Maintain correspondent bank reference data
key_features.description: Enables maintain correspondent bank reference data to support this service domain maintains correspondent bank reference details

key_features.name: Maintain specific correspondent settlement instructions
key_features.description: Enables maintain specific correspondent settlement instructions to support this service domain maintains correspondent bank reference details

key_features.name: Track correspondent bank's service reciprocity
key_features.description: Enables track correspondent bank's service reciprocity to support this service domain maintains correspondent bank reference details
